mentionedBy.notes: Closest full replacement with almost same functionalities: APM, infrastructure monitoring, charting/dashboarding, alerting, log management. User reviews indicate it outperforms Datadog in APM. Unified platform combines APM, infrastructure monitoring, and AIOps. Generative AI automates root cause analysis and predicts anomalies
